title: Campagnolo Super Record 13 Launches as the First 2×13 Road Groupset
content:
Campagnolo Super Record 13 adds a gear and brings back the thumb lever but it’s also faster, lighter, and cheaper than the previous generation

Read the full article at Campagnolo Super Record 13 Launches as the First 2×13 Road Groupset on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
